title: Digital Media Producer - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Digital Media Producer Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: The Digital Media Producer will manage updates of website and create short-form video for social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
